languages.text: "Кунрад Войгтвир фон Валанциус, мой родич, предал династию и Империум. Если он скрывается в системе — я желаю, чтоб его выдали мне".
"My kinsman Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius has betrayed our dynasty and the Imperium. If he is hiding in this system, I want him handed over to me."
languages.original_text: "Кунрад Войгтвир фон Валанциус, мой родич, предал династию и Империум. Если он скрывается в системе — я желаю, чтоб его выдали мне".

traits.locale_text: "My kinsman Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius has betrayed our dynasty and the Imperium. If he is hiding in this system, I want him to be handed over to me."
"My kinsman Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius has betrayed our dynasty and the Imperium. If he is hiding in this system, I want him to be handed over to me."
"My kinsman Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius has betrayed our dynasty and the Imperium. If he is hiding in this system, I want him to be handed over to me."
"My kinsman Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius has betrayed our dynasty and the Imperium. If he is hiding in this system, I want him to be handed over to me."
"My kinsman Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius has betrayed our dynasty and the Imperium. If he is hiding in this system, I want him handed over to me."
"My kinsman Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius has betrayed our dynasty and the Imperium. If he is hiding in this system, I want him handed over to me."

languages.text: "Mein Verwandter Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius hat unsere Dynastie und das Imperium verraten. Wenn er sich in diesem System versteckt, verlange ich, dass er mir übergeben wird."
languages.original_text: "My kinsman Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius has betrayed our dynasty and the Imperium. If he is hiding in this system, I want him handed over to me."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Verwandter Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius hat unsere Dynastie und das Imperium verraten. Wenn er sich in diesem System versteckt, verlange ich, dass er mir übergeben wird."

languages.text: « Mon parent Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius a trahi notre dynastie et l'Imperium. S'il se cache dans ce système, j'exige qu'on me le remette. »
languages.original_text: "My kinsman Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius has betrayed our dynasty and the Imperium. If he is hiding in this system, I want him handed over to me."

traits.locale_text: « Mon parent Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius a trahi notre dynastie et l'Imperium. S'il se cache dans ce système, j'exige qu'on me le remette. »

languages.text: “我的族人昆拉德·维特威尔·冯·瓦兰修斯，他背叛了我们的王朝，背叛了帝国。如果他藏在这个星系里，我希望你能把他交给我。”
languages.original_text: "My kinsman Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius has betrayed our dynasty and the Imperium. If he is hiding in this system, I want him handed over to me."

traits.locale_text: “我的族人昆拉德·维特威尔·冯·瓦兰修斯，他背叛了我们的王朝，背叛了帝国。如果他藏在这个星系里，我希望你能把他交给我。”

languages.text: 「親類のクンラッド・ボイトヴィル・フォン・ヴァランシウスが、我が王朝と帝国を裏切った。もし奴がこの星系に身を隠しているなら、引き渡してほしい」
languages.original_text: "My kinsman Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius has betrayed our dynasty and the Imperium. If he is hiding in this system, I want him handed over to me."

traits.locale_text: 「親類のクンラッド・ボイトヴィル・フォン・ヴァランシウスが、我が王朝と帝国を裏切った。もし奴がこの星系に身を隠しているなら、引き渡してほしい」

languages.text: «Mi pariente Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius ha traicionado a nuestra dinastía y al Imperium Si se esconde en este sistema, quiero que me lo entreguen».
languages.original_text: "My kinsman Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius has betrayed our dynasty and the Imperium. If he is hiding in this system, I want him handed over to me."

traits.locale_text: «Mi pariente Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius ha traicionado a nuestra dinastía y al Imperium Si se esconde en este sistema, quiero que me lo entreguen».

languages.text: "Soydaşım Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius, hanedanlığımıza ve İmparatorluk'a ihanet etmiştir. Şayet bu sistemde saklanıyorsa kendisinin bana teslim edilmesini isterim."
languages.original_text: "My kinsman Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius has betrayed our dynasty and the Imperium. If he is hiding in this system, I want him handed over to me."

traits.locale_text: "Soydaşım Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius, hanedanlığımıza ve İmparatorluk'a ihanet etmiştir. Şayet bu sistemde saklanıyorsa kendisinin bana teslim edilmesini isterim."
